rules_text:
Enchant opponent
Whenever Curse of Fetid Remains enters the battlefield or you cast a spell that targets enchanted player, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. [i](It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
notes:
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
